```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
GDP_Life <- read.csv("life-expectancy-vs-gdp-per-capita.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(GDP_Life, 
       aes(
         x=gdp_per_capita, 
         y=life_expectancy_0,
         color=owid_region)) +
  geom_point(size=2) +
  coord_trans(x = "log2")
```
